scripts.compile-circuits: cross-env NODE_PATH=node_modules/ circom circuits/deposit.circom --r1cs --wasm --output circuits/build/deposit && cross-env NODE_PATH=node_modules/ circom circuits/withdraw.circom --r1cs --wasm --output circuits/build/withdraw && cross-env NODE_PATH=node_modules/ circom circuits/trade.circom --r1cs --wasm --output circuits/build/trade
